title: Ram Navami Procession in Vadodara a Pretext to Show Muslims Hindutva Dominance: Report
selftext: A fact-finding mission by the Centre for Study of Society and Secularism found that the rally on Ram Navami had the distinct goal of showing Muslim residents exactly who dominated the area.
comments: The article is more of an opinion than a report. There are very few facts stated in it (in relation to procession). Most of the content is either some past events or an opinion, rather than a sourced fact.
